mail.title: [Knowledge] "Like" increased {KnowledgeId} - {KnowledgeTitle}
mail.description:
System will notify me when "Like" is pressed on my post.
[Reserved keywords] If you write the following keywords in the body, replace the value when sending mail.
- {URL} : URL of Target data - {KnowledgeId} : ID - {KnowledgeTitle} : Title - {Contents} : Content of article
